content: make your own little blob squid it is an adorable little blob with 10 limbs two of which are long no sewing is required anything within brackets is done within one stitch eg single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet all in one stitch the yarn i used is 4 seasons 8ply marvel and a 2 5mm hook but any yarn and any hook will be suitable for this pattern using smaller hook sizes than indicated on the yarn will keep the stitches tight and there ll be less chance of stuffing showing through i used 8mm eyes for the 8ply blob squids and 10mm for the chunky weight blue one free download please credit to me if you decide to sell any of your blob squids don t hesitate to ask me if you have any questions the pdf pattern is printer friendly
